name: Joy X
description: Respect and honesty are very important in a relationship. I am easy going, trustworthy, and very affectionate. I like to have fun, (anything) as long as its with someone that’s fun to be with. The outdoors and i are two of the same, i love everything about it. I’m very active and athletic and always on the go. .. I love spontaneity because sometimes the spontaneous actions are the most fun. I am a fun-loving person, I work hard and play hard really enjoy relaxing and having fun in my free time. I’m honest (almost to a fault), and very romantic and would love my partner to be same. Looking for a fun and honest relationship with someone special who has great enthusiasm for life itself…Love to snuggle up with that special someone with candle light or by a cozy fire, movies and a glass of wine or a cup of coffee. Love to meet new people but looking forward to meeting that special someone to share these things with! Not into drugs, or the bar scenes.
